'''''Fleeting Colors in Flight''''' is an original soundtrack CD of ''[[Genshin Impact]]''. It was released on January 11, 2023. It is the bonus CD for purchasing the [[Jade Moon Upon a Sea of Clouds (CD Set)|''Jade Moon Upon a Sea of Clouds'' CD Set]].

This CD is a physical copy of the OST album ''[[Fleeting Colors in Flight]]''.
